subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2481
description_text:
Thanks for the Message.
Then i'd like to Upgrade.
How can i pay?

Frederik rehrl



SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> schrieb am Sa., 30. Aug. 2025, 11:12:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com/de>
>
> Hello, the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate you purchased is currently out of
> stock in our German warehouse. We can offer you a discount price of $34.90
> to upgrade to the Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 / Baseplate three-pedal set, with
> immediate dispatch from Germany via DHL. Would you like this?
> Alternatively, we can ship from China using UPS Express, though there is a
> possibility customs duties may apply. Please let me know your preference as
> soon as possible.
>
> Falls du Fragen hast, antworte auf diese E-Mail oder kontaktiere uns unter
> service@simsonn.com.
>

conversations.body_text: Hi frederik rehrl,    Thank you for your reply. You may click this link to make payment, and we shall arrange dispatch immediately.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
